org.am21.client.view.GUI.component.ShelfPanel
所有已实现的接口:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible
public class ShelfPanel extends JPanel
ShelfPanel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to display the shelf

      参数:
      GridX - position X of shelf
      GridY - position Y of shelf
      cellWidth - width of cell
      cellHeight - height of cell
      itemWidth - width of item
      itemHeight - height of item
